column2: the debate about Chicago style versus thin crust.....well I grew up in Chicago and so I have room in my heart for both kinds.  As a kid
column3: my parents would order from Lou Malnattis occasionally and it was always a big deal.  Now as an adult
column4: I order from time to time
column5: as well.  But ya gotta be in the mood for this kinda za.  If you like Chicago style
column6: then you should really like Lou Malnattis.  I have tried to stray off track and order something else off of their menu besides pizza.  I would have to say
